name: Light Eater
description: The Light Eater is a small aberration that camouflages itself as a normal rock while motionless. It has a unique ability to thrive on consuming light, manipulating its surroundings with its multicolored bright light.
memorable: Its ability to absorb light and emit blinding flashes makes it a formidable opponent in battle.
goals: To consume light and ambush unsuspecting foes.
relations: It may be found in areas with abundant light sources, potentially drawing the attention of light-based creatures.
environment: Often found in illuminated areas where it can manipulate light sources.
strengths: Immune to fire and radiant damage, and possesses good stealth abilities.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Intelligence make it vulnerable in direct physical confrontations.
attacks: Can deliver a Tentacle attack for bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Light Absorption, which allows it to diminish light around it and potentially create darkness.
senses: It has blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on light.
skills: Has a passive Perception of 15, indicating good awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Blinds creatures within 30 feet with Emergency Flare
Can sense the location of any light source within 100 feet
Transforms bright light to dim and dim light to darkness
Appears indistinguishable from normal rock while motionless
Sheds multicolored bright light for an hour after extinguishing a light source
test_queries: creature that blinds with light flares
